sentence.Network_en: The three most important varieties are chrysotile, crocidolite and amosite.
sentence.Network_cn: 三种最主要的品种是温石棉, 青石棉和铁石棉.

sentence.Network_en: The strengths decrease in order crocidolite chrysotile, amosite.
sentence.Network_cn: 强度按青石棉,温石棉, 铁石棉顺序下降.

sentence.Network_en: Chrysotile fibers treated with aluminium citrated showed a weaker effect than the untreated.
sentence.Network_cn: 经柠檬酸铝处理后,温石棉的上述作用明显减弱.
